subject: Surfing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: Peter Davi, a renowned big-wave surfer from Monterey, Calif., died Tuesday while riding giant waves at a spot he had helped pioneer off Pebble Beach. He was 45.
snippet: Peter Davi, a renowned big-wave surfer from Monterey, Calif., died Tuesday while riding giant waves at a spot he had helped pioneer off Pebble Beach. He was 45.
